value.name: Gavin MacLeod of 'Love Boat' and 'Mary Tyler Moore' fame dead at 90
value.description: Gavin MacLeod, a sitcom veteran who played seaman "Happy" Haines on "McHale's Navy," Murray on "The Mary Tyler Moore Show" and the very different, vaguely patrician Captain Stubing on "The Love Boat," has died.

value.name: Gavin MacLeod Dies: ‘Love Boat’ Captain And ‘Mary Tyler Moore’ Colleague Was 90
value.description: Gavin MacLeod, who was the Love Boat captain and played Murray on the Mary Tyler Moore Show, two of the top television shows of the 1970s and 1980s, died today at his home in Palm Desert, Calif.

value.name: Autopsy report confirms Allan George shot in the back by cops
value.description: An autopsy report confirms Allan George was fatally shot in the back by Rifle police as they attempted to arrest him Aug. 5 for alleged possession of child pornography. The report also shows George had neither drugs nor alcohol in his system at the time of ...

value.name: Allan George
value.description: Rifle Police Officer Cleared In Allan George Shooting DeathAn officer who shot and killed an armed man in the back as he was trying to escape arrest in western Colorado won't face criminal charges.

value.name: Rifle man shot by police pointed gun at himself before running, bystander video shows
value.description: Before being shot in the back by Rifle Police officers, Allan George pointed a gun at his chest and appeared to try jumping off a bridge into the Colorado River, a second video obtained by the Post Independent shows. George, 57, had a handgun in his right ...

value.name: Man shot in Rifle bridge incident has died; police seeking witness information
value.description: The man shot by police officers in Rifle Monday evening died shortly after the incident, the Garfield County Coroner announced Tuesday. Allan George, 57, was shot on the Colorado River Bridge on Highway 13 heading into Rifle, and taken to Grand River ...

value.name: No charges for officers who shot, killed man in Rifle
value.description: Following a three-month investigation, the DA “concluded that no officer committed a criminal violation” when shooting Allan George, then 54 ... prevailing law does not require a police officer to wait until an armed and dangerous felon has drawn ...

value.name: Gavin MacLeod, ‘Mary Tyler Moore’ and ‘Love Boat’ Actor, Dies at 90
value.description: After years as a journeyman with a long list of credits but little name recognition, he found stardom on two of the biggest television hits of the 1970s and ’80s.
